algorithm_technique: Recursive traversal and merging of nodes based on overlap.
problem_summary_simple: Combine two binary trees by summing overlapping nodes and keeping unique ones.
problem_summary_technical: Recursively merge two binary trees, summing values of overlapping nodes.
key_insights: The problem can be solved recursively by considering the current nodes of both trees.
Base cases are when one of the nodes is null; in that case, return the other node.
If both nodes exist, sum their values and recursively merge their left and right children.
